page.title: 14THE HEAD TEACHER
page.content: Mr Carter is our First School Head Teacher. He teaches classes, takes us for recorder lessons,does assembly, writes letters to our parents, does playground duty and is at school in the holiday to get things ready for the next term. Mr Carter attends up to three meetings a week. He arrives at school approximately 8.05 am. He cannot go on strike because he is in charge of the school and it is his responsibility. Mr Carter is in charge of everyone who works at this school. He orders everything, stock, books, badges and other school materials. Mr Carter interviews people for new jobs at school. He sees visitors and does the bank. This school opened in 1972. Mr. Carter is in change of the school building. He likes to meet old pupils. Mr Carter enjoys everything he does.
